attributes.additional_details: We think Keir Starmer has lost control of the United Kingdom. Kier Starmers promise's have still not arrived after being in charge for just under a year yet the immigration is getting out of hand and he is NOT the person we need to stop this , why take valuable money from the less able and people that cannot physically work ? But still provide millions of pounds to Ukraine and wars that do not need our help. The people of the Country needs to be put first!
attributes.background: We as the United Kingdom citizens want a new general election and for Keir Starmer to step down immediately

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
